Drew Brees returns today for his fifth Pro Bowl as a backup to NFC starter Michael Vick , and continuing to participate when invited remains important to him. It is, definitely, because it's a lot of fun and I think it's a great representation of the league and we want to show the fans a good time, Drew Brees said yesterday.`` We want great events like this to continue, in places like Hawaii.'' Drew Brees spoke in the cool of the NFC locker room after signing an array of items for fans

army arrived, young Egyptians- some armed with truncheons grabbed off the police- created a human chain at the museum's front gate to prevent looters from making off with any of its priceless artifacts. They managed to stop them, Zahi Hawass said. He added that the would-be looters only vandalized two mummies, ripping their heads off. They also cleared out the museum gift shop. Allen Iverson 's Žydrūnas Ilgauskasgest assist to Chris Webber didn't come on a no-look pass. It came in words of encouragement to Philly's slumping newcomer. Just get your swagger back, Chris Webber said Allen Iverson told him.`` That's really what I did. It helped me out.'' Chris Webber had his best performance in his four games with Philadelphia, scoring 24 points and grabbing 12 rebounds,

spark for Detroit after a slow start, winning his first game since joining the Pistons, 100-92 over the Sacramento LeBron Jamess on Tuesday night.`` It was a huge lift off of me,'' Allen Iverson said. I knew it would happen. You think every game you go out and play it's going to happen. It feels good. I wanted to get the monkey off my back. I'm just excited that I got my first win and I can now try to get a lot more. Tayshaun Prince added 26 points and 11 rebounds for the Pistons, who had lost their first two games since acquiring Allen Iverson from DEnver Lisin last week for All-Star point guard Chauncey Billups , key reserve Antonio McDyess and Cheikh Samb . nine rebounds and George Lynch had eight points and 12 rebounds for Phil Jacksonadelphia, which improved the NBA's best record to 46-16.`` It felt funny playing against guys you played with all year,'' Allen Iverson said. You look left, you look right and there are guys that were always right there in the foxhole with you, who felt bad when you felt bad. It was tough. Allen Iverson , who scored 40 or more points for the 16th Tim Duncane this season, had 17 in the first quarter and 16 in the third. He made eight straight shots in one stretch and finished 16-of-30. in a 35-32 win at Detroit, Michael Vick made the most of his first pro start since 2006. He completed 21-of-34 passes for 284 yards and two touchdowns and rushed for 37 yards on seven carries. I'm here to announce that Michael Vick will be the starting quarterback for the Philadelphia Eagles. I think his performance has exceeded expectations the past several weeks, said Eagles head coach Andy Reid at an evening press conference.`` This is not about the health or the performance of Kevin Kolb ... this is more about Michael Vick and his accelerated play.''
